thread.title: Kim Yong Chol: the man sent by Pyongyang

title: Kim Yong Chol: the man sent by Pyongyang
text:
Kim Yong Chol: the man sent by Pyongyang Wednesday, May 30, 2018 - 02:08
When Kim Yong Chol lands in New York this week, he will become the most senior North Korean envoy to hold talks with American officials on U.S. soil in 18 years. The former spy chief is a trusted adviser to North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, playing a pivotal role in preparations for an historic summit between Kim and U.S. President Donald Trump. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
When Kim Yong Chol lands in New York this week, he will become the most senior North Korean envoy to hold talks with American officials on U.S. soil in 18 years. The former spy chief is a trusted adviser to North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, playing a pivotal role in preparations for an historic summit between Kim and U.S. President Donald Trump.
